item.title: train collides with jeep in eastern india, 17 dead
item.description: at least 17 people were killed when an express train collided with a crowded jeep which was driving across an unmanned railway crossing in the eastern indian state of bihar, police said on sunday.

item.title: syria's assad deploys army in port to keep order
